words.def: a rigid bar pivoted about a fulcrum
a facial expression of contempt or scorn
a roll of photographic film holding a series of frames to be projected by a movie projector
Something with the shape of the letter V. Found in compounds such as vee-necked.
rate of revolution of a motor
the basic unit of money in Bulgaria
(Old Testament) Adam's wife in Judeo-Christian mythology: the first woman and mother of the human race
United States filmmaker whose works explore the richness of black culture in America (born in 1957)
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
